author: aryanXmahajan
text:
how to close enterprise clients before they realize you're 22:

- answer their email in 4 minutes (they're used to 4 days)
- send loom explaining the solution before they finish writing requirements doc
- schedule call for tomorrow (they wanted "sometime next quarter")
- on call: "we can start monday" (they're still building business case)
- deliver production system in 6 days (they haven't finished internal approvals)
- by the time procurement asks for your company size, you're already deployed
- invoice arrives, they pay it because stopping you is more work than paying you
- they introduce you to their parent company
- repeat

the secret: move so fast they never have time to ask the questions that would disqualify you

enterprise speed is their weakness

exploit it
